1794,92|1754,111|1748,160|1750,160|1790,160|1810,158|1830,154|1850,152|1870,152|1890,150|1956,150|1952,128|1938,100|1794,92 303-01|p|.|303|.
345,123|317,126|307,134|221,211|219,233|230,228|250,228|270,229|290,229|310,230|330,230|350,231|390,231|410,232|430,232|450,233|470,233|490,234|530,234|550,235|570,235|590,236|610,236|630,237|670,237|690,238|710,238|730,239|750,239|770,240|790,240|810,241|850,241|870,242|890,242|910,243|930,243|950,244|990,244|1010,245|1030,245|1050,246|1070,246|1090,247|1130,247|1150,248|1170,248|1190,249|1210,249|1230,250|1250,250|1270,251|1310,251|1330,252|1350,252|1370,253|1390,253|1410,254|1450,254|1470,255|1490,255|1510,256|1530,256|1550,257|1590,257|1610,258|1630,258|1650,259|1670,259|1690,260|1710,260|1730,261|1770,261|1790,262|1810,262|1830,263|1850,263|1870,264|1910,264|1930,265|1950,265|1965,266|1968,238|1966,207|1956,150|1890,150|1870,152|1850,152|1830,154|1810,158|1790,160|1750,160|1748,160|1748,162|1551,168|1314,166|1051,144|654,153|524,153|345,123 303-02|Letters|Orders|and|Instructions|December|.|1755|.
